## Introduction

Implementation of Singular Value Decomposition, a [thread](https://twitter.com/WomenInStat/status/1285610321747611653)
```{r}
rows = 50
cols = 100
x <- matrix(rnorm(rows*cols), ncol = cols)
u <- rnorm(rows)
v <- rnorm(cols)
for (i in 1:cols) {
  u <- x%*%v
  u <- u/sqrt(sum(u^2))
  v <- t(x)%*%u
  v <- v/sqrt(sum(v^2))
}

svdx <- svd(x)
cor(svdx$v[,1], v)
cor(svdx$u[,1],u)
```
